line.annotation: create_ing(ing1, "1 (4 pound) chicken, cut into pieces")

line.originaltext: Heat olive oil in a large Dutch oven over medium heat.
Heat olive oil in a large Dutch oven over medium heat.
line.annotation: cook(ing0, t0, ing14, "hot olive oil", "over medium heat")

line.originaltext: Sprinkle chicken with garlic powder, and brown on both sides.
line.annotation: combine({ing1, ing14, ing2}, ing15, "ckicken in oil", "")

line.originaltext: Sprinkle chicken with garlic powder, and brown on both sides.
line.annotation: cook(ing15, t0, ing16, "browned chicken", "brown on both sides")

line.originaltext: Spoon off chicken fat, and return pan to stove.
line.annotation: do(ing16, t0, ing17, "browned chicken", "spoon fat from Dutch oven, return pan to stove")

line.originaltext: Stir in mushrooms and onions; cook, stirring occasionally, until onions are soft.
Stir in mushrooms and onions; cook, stirring occasionally, until onions are soft.
line.annotation: cook(ing18, t0, ing19, "cooked veggies", "until onions are soft")

line.originaltext: In a separate bowl, mix together basil, oregano, rosemary, and thyme.
In a separate bowl, mix together basil, oregano, rosemary, and thyme.
line.annotation: combine({ing5, ing6, ing7, ing8}, ing20, "combined herbs", "")

line.originaltext: Season with garlic salt, pepper, and poultry seasoning.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing11, ing20, ing9}, ing21, "herbs and poultry seasoning", "")

line.originaltext: Stir in wine, and add to onion and mushrooms.
line.annotation: combine({ing12, ing19, ing21}, ing22, "veggies with seasoning", "")

line.originaltext: Pour mushroom mixture and broth over chicken; cover, and cook over low heat until meat begins to fall off the bone, about 1 1/2 hours.
line.annotation: combine({ing13, ing17, ing22}, ing23, "chicken with broth and seasoning", "")

line.originaltext: Pour mushroom mixture and broth over chicken; cover, and cook over low heat until meat begins to fall off the bone, about 1 1/2 hours.
line.annotation: cook(ing23, t0, ing24, "cooked chicken", "until meat falls off the bone, about 1 1/2 hours")

line.originaltext: Pour mushroom mixture and broth over chicken; cover, and cook over low heat until meat begins to fall off the bone, about 1 1/2 hours.
